movies.title: Peaky Blinders
movies.description: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England, and centered on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

movies.title: Naruto Shippuden
movies.description: Naruto Shippuden is the sequel to the original Naruto series. It follows Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

movies.title: Havoc
movies.description: When a drug heist swerves lethally out of control, a jaded cop fights his way through a corrupt city's criminal underworld to save a politician's son.

movies.title: Ben 10
movies.description: When 10-year-old Ben Tennyson discovers a mysterious device, he gains the power to change into ten different alien heroes, each with uniquely awesome powers. With such abilities at his disposal, Ben realizes a greater responsibility to help others and stop evildoers, but that doesn't mean he's above a little superpowered mischief now and then.

movies.title: Money Heist
movies.description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' recruits a band of robbers to carry out an ambitious plan to rob the Royal Mint of Spain.

movies.title: Jewel Thief: The Heist Begins
movies.description: In this high-octane battle of wits and wills, ingenious con artist Rehan devises a diamond heist while trying to outsmart Rajan, his sadistic adversary.

movies.title: Thunderbolts*
movies.description: After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap, seven disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts.

movies.title: In the Lost Lands
movies.description: A queen sends the powerful and feared sorceress Gray Alys to the ghostly wilderness of the Lost Lands in search of a magical power, where she and her guide, the drifter Boyce, must outwit and outfight both man and demon.

movies.title: Captain America: Brave New World
movies.description: After the events of "The Falcon and the Winter Soldier", Sam Wilson takes on the mantle of Captain America and must face a new threat to the world.

movies.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
movies.description: Puss in Boots is on a mission to recover the Princess' stolen ruby from the notorious French thief, Whisperer. Reluctantly accompanied by three little kittens, Three Diablos, Puss must tame them before they endanger the mission.

movies.title: Bullet Train Explosion
movies.description: When panic erupts on a Tokyo-bound bullet train that will explode if it slows below 100 kph, authorities race against time to save everyone on board.

movies.title: Alice in Borderland
movies.description: With his two friends, a video-game-obsessed young man finds himself in a strange version of Tokyo where they must compete in dangerous games to win.

movies.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
movies.description: Tanjiro and his friends embark on a new mission to the Swordsmith Village, where they must confront powerful demons and protect the village from destruction.

movies.title: Day of Reckoning
movies.description: Put-upon lawman John Dorsey is on the verge of losing his wife and his job as sheriff, so he posses up with bullish U.S. Marshall Butch Hayden to hold outlaw Emily Rusk hostage. A battle of wills ensues as Emily turns the posse on themselves, but as her marauding husband and his gang approach, Emily and John realize they will need each other to survive.

movies.title: Death of a Unicorn
movies.description: A father and daughter accidentally hit and kill a unicorn while en route to a weekend retreat, where his billionaire boss seeks to exploit the creature’s miraculous curative properties.

movies.title: Sinners
movies.description: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

movies.title: London Has Fallen
movies.description: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning discovers a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

movies.title: Dunkirk
movies.description: The story of the miraculous evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, Britain, Canada and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbour of Dunkirk between May 26th and June 4th 1940 during World War II.

movies.title: Prison Break
movies.description: Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man is sent to death row and his only hope is his brother, who makes it his mission to deliberately get himself sent to the same prison in order to break the both of them out, from the inside out.

movies.title: The Girl Next Door
movies.description: Exceptionally ambitious high schooler Matthew has aspirations for a career in politics when he falls in love with his gorgeous 19-year-old neighbor, Danielle. But Matthew's bright future is jeopardized when he finds Danielle was once a porn star. As Danielle's past catches up with her, Matthew's love for her forces him to re-evaluate his goals.

movies.title: Lupin
movies.description: In the early 1990s, a group of thieves led by Lupin III, the grandson of the famous gentleman thief Arsène Lupin, steal a priceless diamond from a museum in Paris. The diamond is said to be cursed and brings misfortune to its owner. The group is pursued by Inspector Zenigata, who is determined to capture Lupin and his gang.

movies.title: Game of Thrones
movies.description: Set in the mythical land of Westeros, Game of Thrones follows the power struggles between noble families as they vie for control of the Iron Throne. With a sprawling cast of characters, political intrigue, and epic battles, the series explores themes of loyalty, betrayal, and the consequences of ambition.

movies.title: Dragon Ball Super
movies.description: With Majin Buu defeated half-a-year prior, peace returns to Earth, where Son Goku (now a radish farmer) and his friends now live peaceful lives. However, a new threat appears in the form of Beerus, the God of Destruction. Considered the most terrifying being in the entire universe, Beerus is eager to fight the legendary warrior seen in a prophecy foretold decades ago known as the Super Saiyan God. The series retells the events from the two Dragon Ball Z films, Battle of Gods and Resurrection 'F' before proceeding to an original story about the exploration of alternate universes.

movies.title: Delicious in Dungeon
movies.description: When young adventurer Laios and his party are attacked by a dragon, they lose their supplies and one of their members. To survive, they must venture into the dungeon to find food and rescue their friend.

movies.title: Hunter x Hunter
movies.description: Twelve-year-old Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, a specialist who takes on dangerous tasks such as discovering uncharted territories or locating rare items. He hopes to find his absentee father, who is also a Hunter.

movies.title: One Piece
movies.description: Luffy will do anything to get the One Piece and become King of the Pirates!

movies.title: Attack on Titan
movies.description: Many years ago, the last remnants of humanity were forced to retreat behind the towering walls of a fortified city to escape the massive, man-eating Titans that roamed the land outside their fortress. Only the heroic members of the Scouting Legion dared to stray beyond the safety of the walls – but even those brave warriors seldom returned alive. Those within the city clung to the illusion of a peaceful existence until the day that dream was shattered, and their slim chance at survival was reduced to one horrifying choice: kill – or be devoured!

movies.title: The Good Doctor
movies.description: A young surgical resident with autism and savant syndrome is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.

movies.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
movies.description: As the gang returns to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they discover that nothing is as they expect. The game has changed.

movies.title: Bleach
movies.description: For as long as he can remember, Ichigo Kurosaki has been able to see ghosts. But when he meets Rukia, a Soul Reaper who battles evil spirits known as Hollows, he finds his life is changed forever. Now, with a newfound wealth of spiritual energy, Ichigo discovers his true calling: to protect the living and the dead from evil.

movies.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
movies.description: Yuuji Itadori is a high school student with extraordinary physical abilities. He joins the Occult Club to help his friends, but when they accidentally unseal a cursed object, he finds himself in a world of curses and sorcery.

movies.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
movies.description: Sidelined after an accident, hotshot Los Angeles lawyer Mickey Haller restarts his career - and his trademark Lincoln - when he takes on a murder case.

movies.title: Blacklist
movies.description: Raymond Reddington, one of the FBI's most wanted fugitives, surrenders in person at FBI Headquarters in Washington, D.C. He claims that he and the FBI have the same interests: bringing down dangerous criminals and terrorists. In the last two decades, he's made a list of criminals and terrorists that matter the most but the FBI cannot find because it does not know they existReddington will co-operate, but insists that he will speak only to Elizabeth Keen, a rookie FBI profiler.

movies.title: Squid Game
movies.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

movies.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
movies.description: In the criminal justice system, sexually-based offenses are considered especially heinous. In New York City, the dedicated detectives who investigate these vicious felonies are members of an elite squad known as the Special Victims Unit. These are their stories.

movies.title: Spongebob Squarepants
movies.description: SpongeBob SquarePants is a American animated television series created by marine science educator and animator Stephen Hillenburg for Nickelodeon. The series chronicles the exploits and adventures of the title character and his various friends in the fictional underwater city of Bikini Bottom.

movies.title: Supa Strikas
movies.description: With dreams of becoming Super League champions, a talented striker named Shakes and his football team take on rivals while going on global adventures.

movies.title: Pluto
movies.description: When the world's seven most advanced robots and their human allies are murdered one by one, Inspector Gesicht soon discovers that he's also in danger.

movies.title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
movies.description: In a dystopia where body modification is the norm, a street kid tries to survive by becoming an edgerunner, a mercenary outlaw also known as a cyberpunk.
